src:
Festival Darfest tudi malo slovenski
Na nedavnem festivalu v sosednji Hrvaški tudi dva naša glasbena izvajalca. Robert Ficker je zapel pesem Pogreška, Zoran Cilenšek pa Evo mene opet.
05 Nov 2019, 20:31 by Mojca Marot



Družbe Gorana Karana je bil vesel tudi Zoran Cilenšek. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV



Avtorja skladbe Pogreška sta (z leve) Aleš Zibelnik in Rusko Richie, Robert Ficker pa je pesem odpel na Darfestu. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV


Na sosednjem Hrvaškem po poletni sezoni očitno nadaljujejo festivale, na njih pa se zadnje čase redno pojavljajo tudi slovenski izvajalci. Letos sta se na Darfestu predstavila dva, in sicer Robert Ficker, ki se redno udeležuje festivalov pri naših sosedih, ter njegov glasbeni prijatelj Zoran Cilenšek. »Jaz sem se predstavil s pesmijo Pogreška, Zoran pa s pesmijo Evo mene opet, za katero sem mu napisal besedilo,« je povedal Ficker. Avtor glasbe in besedila njegove pesmi Pogreška je Rusko Richie, medtem ko je za aranžma poskrbel Aleš Zibelnik, back vokal je prispevala Manca Špik, za zven akustične kitare pa je poskrbel Miha Meglič. Glavni v glasbeni žiriji je bil prav tako znani hrvaški pevec Goran Karan. A festivalskih nastopov za Fickerja za


Avtorja skladbe Pogreška sta (z leve) Aleš Zibelnik in Rusko Richie, Robert Ficker pa je pesem odpel na Darfestu. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV

letos še ni konec. »Novembra bom nastopil še na dveh, in sicer na festivalu MEF, kar je kratica za Međimurski festival Čakovec, na katerem se bom predstavil s pesmijo z naslovom Ja bolujem, prav tako me čaka nastop na festivalu Zlatne note v Križevcih, kjer bom zapel pesem Gorka rijeka. Za obe sem besedilo napisal sam, glasbo Zlatko Dobrič, za aranžma pa je poskrbel Josip Pokupec,« še razkriva Robert Ficker. Decembra se bo predstavil tudi slovenski publiki, in sicer na glasbeni prireditvi Moč glasbe nas združuje, ki bo tradicionalno v Lenartu.
text:
The Darfest Festival is also a little Slovenian
Also at our recent festival in neighboring Croatia are two of our music artists. Robert Ficker sang the song Error, Zoran Cilenšek and Here I Am Again.
05 Nov 2019, 20:31 by Mojca Marot



Zoran Cilenšek was delighted with the company of Goran Karan. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE



The authors of the track Error (from left) are Ales Zibelnik and Russian Richie, while Robert Ficker sang the song at Darfest. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE


Festivals are apparently continuing in neighboring Croatia after the summer season, with Slovene performers appearing on a regular basis lately. This year, Darfest featured two, namely Robert Ficker, who regularly attends festivals with our neighbors, and his music friend Zoran Cilensek. "I introduced myself with the song Error, and Zoran with the song Here I am again, for which I wrote the text for him," said Ficker. The author of the music and lyrics of his song Error is Rusko Richie, while the arrangement is arranged by Aleš Zibelnik, back vocals are contributed by Manca Špik, and the sound of the acoustic guitar is provided by Miha Meglič. Famous Croatian singer Goran Karan was also the jury chief. And festival appearances for Ficker for


The authors of the track Error (from left) are Ales Zibelnik and Russian Richie, while Robert Ficker sang the song at Darfest. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE

this year is not over. “In November, I will perform two more at the MEF Festival, which is an acronym for the Čakovec Festival of Međimurje, where I will present myself with a song entitled I am Sick, and I will also be performing at the Golden Notes Festival in Križevci, where I will sing a song. Bitter river. I wrote the lyrics myself, the music was by Zlatko Dobrič, and the arrangement was arranged by Josip Pokupec, "reveals Robert Ficker. It will also be presented to Slovenian audiences in December at the music event The Power of Music Unites Us, which will traditionally be held in Lenart.
